data.expected_result: The member list closes. If it is intended that the member list closes then there shouldn't be any button in the member list for closing the list.
data.short_description: Clicking on the member list button in a group DM video call again after clicking it once does not close the list.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a group DM video call (even lonely ones work). - Click on the member list button. - After the list opens, click on the button again.
